channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: American Primeval and the bloody truth about the Mormon massacre of 1857
Judgment in Trump fraud case stands at $502 million before inauguration
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will likely owe the state of New York about half a billion dollars when he's sworn in as president.

item.title: Scientists warn of phenomenon observed in one-third of world's beaches — and we might be underestimating the problem

item.title: Fox to stream Super Bowl for free on Tubi for the first time
item.description: A second stream on Tubi will feature the "Tubi Red Carpet" hosted by Olivia Culpo from the Superdome in New Orleans.

item.title: WATCH: Cat gets cozy while interrupting her dad’s Zoom call
item.description: This cat found the perfect spot to relax, which happens to be right in front of the Zoom camera.

item.title: From LA wildfires to hurricanes, immigrants help rebuild after disasters. Some may face deportation
item.description: After disasters like the wildfires in Los Angeles happen, much of the rebuilding work is done by Latino immigrant workers, many in the country illegal...

item.title: Inside the monumental effort behind LA’s firefight, from strategy to meals and laundry

item.description: Several of President-elect Donald Trump's Cabinet picks are testifying at their Senate confirmation hearings. CBS News' Taurean Small breaks down some...

item.title: As wildfires linger, focus turns to rebuilding Los Angeles’ leveled neighborhoods
Ukrainian brigade pioneers remote-controlled ground assaults
NY governor deploys more cops to NYC subway system after high-profile incidents
item.description: New York City Gov. Kathy Hochul announced Thursday that she is deploying more police officers to the New York City subway system.

item.title: Middle East live updates: Israeli cabinet to ratify ceasefire on Friday
item.description: The Israel Defense Forces continues its intense airstrike and ground campaigns in Gaza with ceasefire talks ending with success in Qatar.

item.title: Many U.S. adults doubt Trump will be able to bring down costs
item.description: Many U.S. adults are skeptical about President-elect Donald Trump's ability to bring down costs.

item.title: A timeline of the devastating Los Angeles wildfires as they continue to burn

item.title: Giuliani to keep apartments, World Series rings in settlement with election workers
item.description: The ex-New York City mayor owes two election workers $148 million.
